rows.label: tlk41100126_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I can't believe Luchini knows a bunch
of Drivers as amazing as you guys!

rows.label: tlk41100126_01_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm a bit jealous, 'cos the only Driver
I know is a lazy old bum...

rows.label: tlk41100126_01_msg0003
rows.name:
I bet you and your Blade do some
awesome Blade Combos, am I right?

rows.label: tlk41100126_01_msg0004
rows.name:
You get an elemental effect along with
that, so it should really help you get an
edge up on your enemies!

rows.label: tlk41100126_01_msg0005
rows.name:
I really want to see a combo someday.
Driver and Blade fighting side by side...
Yes, please!
